  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_114832</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_114832</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Rayleigh scattering in an optical fibre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rayleigh, das in eine optische Faser zerstreut</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Rayleigh dispersant dans une fibre optique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Rayleigh que dispersa em uma fibra ótica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rayleigh che sparge in una fibra ottica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διασπορά Rayleigh σε μια οπτική ίνα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Rayleigh que dispersa en una fibra óptica</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This line graph shows the intensity of light as it is transmitted through an optical fibre. There is an exponential decrease in the intensity of light over distance due to Rayleigh scattering.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">exponential decay</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light intensity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light transmission</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">optical fibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Rayleigh scattering</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Zeile Diagramm zeigt die Intensität des 
Lichtes, während sie durch eine optische Faser übertragen wird. 
Es gibt eine exponentiale Abnahme an der Intensität des 
Lichtüberabstandes, der Rayleigh zum Zerstreuen passend ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce graphe par ligne montre l'intensité de la 
lumière pendant qu'il est transmis par une fibre optique. Il y 
a une diminution exponentielle de l'intensité de la distance finie de
lumière due à la dispersion de Rayleigh.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta linha gráfico mostra a intensidade da luz 
enquanto é transmitida através de uma fibra ótica. Há uma 
diminuição exponencial na intensidade da distância excedente da luz
devido a dispersar de Rayleigh.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo grafico lineare mostra l'intensità di 
luce mentre è trasmesso attraverso una fibra ottica. Ci è una 
diminuzione esponenziale nell'intensità della distanza eccessiva 
della luce dovuto la dispersione di Rayleigh.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η γραφική παράσταση γραμμών εμφανίζει την 
ένταση του φωτός όπως διαβιβάζεται μέσω μιας οπτικής ίνας. 
Υπάρχει μια εκθετική μείωση στην ένταση του φωτός πέρα 
από την απόσταση λόγω στη διασπορά Rayleigh.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta línea gráfico muestra la intensidad de la 
luz mientras que se transmite a través de una fibra óptica. 
Hay una disminución exponencial de la intensidad de la 
distancia excesiva de la luz  debido a la dispersión de Rayleigh.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">exponentialer Zerfall</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lichtintensität</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">helle Übertragung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">optische Faser</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rayleigh Zerstreuen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">affaiblissement exponentiel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">intensité de la lumière</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">transmission légère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">fibre optique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dispersion de Rayleigh</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">deterioração exponencial</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">intensidade clara</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">transmissão clara</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fibra ótica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dispersar de Rayleigh</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">decadimento esponenziale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">intensità della luce della luce</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">trasmissione della luce</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fibra ottica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dispersione di Rayleigh</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ελαφριά ένταση</string>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">intensidad de luz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
